guide.title: Welcome to Theo Challengers!
guide.step_1_desc: You start with 2 coins. Earn more by completing daily challenges.
guide.step_2_desc: Use your coins to buy challenge items from the Daily Shop (reset every day!).
guide.step_3_desc: Send a challenge link to a friend via messaging apps.
guide.step_4_desc: When they complete it, they send you a claim link. Verify it to earn points!
